title: BLOOM's experiment carbon footprint
description:
To calculate the BLOOM carbon footprint, Alexandra Sasha Luccioni, Sylvain Viguier and Anne-Laure Ligozat made an experience: they run 16 Nvidia A100 GPUs during 18 days. Those GPUs handled an average of 558 requests per hour for a total of 230,768 queries. The total consumption of electricity was 914 kWh for CPU, RAM and GPU usage.

For the emissions, we used a grid emissions factor for Western USA (WECC) from EPA.
